name: Training Simulation02
description:
in Training Simulation02 you help an Ai powered cube named Benjamin solve various puzzles in order to reach the goal at the end of each level, 

the puzzles will constantly bend the rules to create challenging puzzles.

The entire game will be open sourced after ratings end cos why not

This entire game was made on stream, the full timelapse + vc highlight reel will be out here as soon as ive edited it
